```lean4
theorem putnam_1979_b6
(n : ℕ)
(z : Fin n → ℂ)
: (|((∑ i : Fin n, (z i) ^ 2) ^ ((1 : ℂ) / 2)).re| ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re|) := by
  have h₁ : |((∑ i : Fin n, (z i) ^ 2) ^ ((1 : ℂ) / 2)).re| ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by
    have h₁ : |((∑ i : Fin n, (z i) ^ 2) ^ ((1 : ℂ) / 2)).re| ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by
      -- Use the fact that the real part of the square root of the sum of squares is bounded by the sum of the absolute values of the real parts.
      calc
        |((∑ i : Fin n, (z i) ^ 2) ^ ((1 : ℂ) / 2)).re| ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by
          simpa [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, Complex.re, Complex.im, sq, Real.sqrt_le_iff] using
            calc
              |((∑ i : Fin n, (z i) ^ 2) ^ ((1 : ℂ) / 2)).re| ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by
                simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, Complex.re, Complex.im, sq, Real.sqrt_le_iff]
                all_goals
                  exact?
              _ = ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by rfl
        _ = ∑ i : Fin n, |(z i).re| := by rfl
    exact h₁
  
  exact h₁
```
